original_text: Now when all the people came to the forest, behold, there was honey on the ground.
korean_text: 그들이 다 수풀에 들어간즉 땅에 꿀이 있더라

sentences.original_text: Now when all the people came to the forest,
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 모든 백성이 수림에 이르렀을 때에,

sentences.original_text: there was honey on the ground.
